body: Hi Alireza, I checked wxfalsecolor source code. Tomas is using wx libraries for converting to png. I ended up using Windows libraries. I added a new component that let you convert image files. It won't convert an HDR file to PNG but you can convert frequently used image file types. You have to do in two steps (HDR>TIFF>PNG) but it does the job. I also added the maskThreshold as an input so you can change it for your studies. Please check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LzTY94yzCcJrseHYcFgsdFJbDYLb6ltJFPOoNCniKaWQyIoCrVi3poVh6DgenkTniAj6UbA-RhLKW*UNVDOpSt20s5jUThmW/falseColorMasked_PNG.png) Best of luck with your studies, Mostapha
